Case# CFLocaleLanguageDirection.leftToRight

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOStvOSvisionOSwatchOS

```
case leftToRight
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFLocaleLanguageDirection/leftToRight#Discussion)

The language direction is from left to right.
